title: Streaming high diamond solo queue :)
body: Streaming mid-high diamond solo-queue (ADC main) on OCE server, come have a watch and follow if you enjoy :) thanks alot.

replies.body: ADC mains ... ugh. Nothing more enjoyable than watching people jerk themselves off about how much damage they do and how they carry the game. Hopefully you arnt one of those ADC Mains.
Hello, I have added your stream to the Oceanic Streams thread on boards.
